TITLE: ASTALAVISTA TORRENT MEGA HITS COLLECTION VOLUME 1
CATEGORY: MUSIC - VARIOUS ARTISTS
FORMAT: BIN/CUE CD AUDIO FOR PLAYBACK IN ANY CD PLAYER OR RIPPED TO YOUR MP3 COLLECTION.
PROTECTION: NONE



DESCRIPTION:

OUR MEGA HITS COLLECTIONS ARE COMPILATIONS OF VARIOUS ARTISTS&#039; MUSIC AND ARE UNIQUE RELEASES. EACH TRACK HAS
BEEN DIGITALLY REMASTERED FROM THE ORIGINAL IMPROVING OVERALL SOUND QUALITY AND CLARITY. IN ADDITION, EACH
REMASTERED TRACK IS CHECKED AGAINST FREQUENCY AND DECIBEL METERS TO ENSURE THAT THE SOUND IS NOT OVERDRIVEN 
TO THE POINT OF DAMAGING YOUR EARS OR YOUR SOUND EQUIPMENT. THIS IS DONE BY A PROFESSIONAL MUSIC STUDIO AND
REMASTERING COMPANY. SPECIAL THANKS OUT TO AUDIOVATIONS, LLC FOR PROVIDING THIS EXTENSIVE MASTERING TO US
FOR THIS PROJECT AND DOING SO ABSOLUTELY FREE OF ANY CHARGE WHATSOEVER. YOU CAN NOT BUY THIS COLLECTION OF
HITS ANYWHERE AS IT IS A FREE PROJECT. IF YOU LIKE THE ARTISTS&#039; MUSIC IN THE COLLECTION, PLEASE GO AND BUY
THEIR CDS AND SUPPORT THE MANY PEOPLE WHO ARE INVOLVED IN THE MUSIC AND ENTERTAINMENT INDUSTRY.

ADDITIONALLY, THESE COLLECTIONS WILL BE HOSTED ON A LIGHTNING FAST SEEDBOX SERVER UPON RELEASE TO ALLOW YOU
FAST DOWNLOAD, BUT WE DO ASK THAT YOU RESEED THIS AS FUTURE VOLUMES RELEASE, THE OLDER ONES WILL BE REMOVED
FROM THE SEEDBOX SERVER TO MAKE ROOM. IF YOU WOULD LIKE YOUR OWN SEEDBOX SERVER, PLEASE REGISTER AT OUR
TORRENT SITE, ASTALAVISTATORRENT.COM AND CONTACT PRESWYLDE OR MASTERMAN FOR DETAILS AND PRICING. THE SERVERS
ARE MUCH MORE AFFORDABLE THAN YOU THINK.

ENJOY
